data.text: More on happiness & well-being -- @UN_News_Centre talks with Prime Minister of Bhutan http://t.co/9mEXRF75 #GNH

Ban Ki-moon at happiness event: "Social, economic & environmental well-being are indivisible" http://t.co/Eaxm99J7 #GNH #futurewewant
Huge turnout for today's event on happiness & well-being -- photo from conf room 1. Follow #GNH for updates. http://t.co/ziuPsrD7

April: United States assumes rotating presidency of #UN Security Council. Follow @USUN & @AmbassadorRice for updates. #UNSC

Drylands Ambassador & @MissUniverse Leila Lopes calls for greater efforts to fight desertification http://t.co/UVtEeeIt #futurewewant
@josiannezwart Walk-up tickets are often available, especially if you come in the morning.  You can also email abebej@un.org for help.
@josiannezwart We're asking our colleagues for advice and will get back to you.
Watch now: @MissUniverse Leila Lopes announces her support for #FutureWeWant, focusing on drylands: http://t.co/b4dcxDGU #Rioplus20
